      • createActionPopupMenu

        public ActionPopupMenu createActionPopupMenu(java.lang.String place,
                                             ActionGroup group)
        Description copied from class: ActionManager
        Factory method that creates an ActionPopupMenu from the specified group. The specified place is associated with the created popup.
        Specified by:
        createActionPopupMenu in class ActionManager
        Parameters:
        place - Determines the place that will be set for AnActionEvent passed when an action from the group is either performed or updated See ActionPlaces
        group - Group from which the actions for the menu are taken.
        Returns:
        An instance of ActionPopupMenu

      • createActionToolbar

        public ActionToolbar createActionToolbar(java.lang.String place,
                                         ActionGroup group,
                                         boolean horizontal)
        Description copied from class: ActionManager
        Factory method that creates an ActionToolbar from the specified group. The specified place is associated with the created toolbar.
        Specified by:
        createActionToolbar in class ActionManager
        Parameters:
        place - Determines the place that will be set for AnActionEvent passed when an action from the group is either performed or updated. See ActionPlaces
        group - Group from which the actions for the toolbar are taken.
        horizontal - The orientation of the toolbar (true - horizontal, false - vertical)
        Returns:
        An instance of ActionToolbar

      • isGroup

        public boolean isGroup(java.lang.String actionId)
        Description copied from class: ActionManager
        Checks if the specified action ID represents an action group and not an individual action. Calling this method does not cause instantiation of a specific action class corresponding to the action ID.
        Specified by:
        isGroup in class ActionManager
        Parameters:
        actionId - the ID to check.
        Returns:
        true if the ID represents an action group, false otherwise.

        Parameters:
        actionPlace - the place where the panel will be used (see ActionPlaces).
        messageActionGroup - the action group from which the toolbar is created.

      • registerAction

        public void registerAction(java.lang.String actionId,
                           AnAction action,
                           PluginId pluginId)
        Description copied from class: ActionManager
        Registers the specified action with the specified id.
        Specified by:
        registerAction in class ActionManager
        Parameters:
        actionId - Id to associate with the action
        action - Action to register
        pluginId - Identifier of the plugin owning the action. Used to show the actions in the correct place under the "Plugins" node in the "Keymap" settings pane and similar dialogs.

      • registerAction

        public void registerAction(java.lang.String actionId,
                           AnAction action)
        Description copied from class: ActionManager
        Registers the specified action with the specified id. Note that the IDE's keymaps processing deals only with registered actions.
        Specified by:
        registerAction in class ActionManager
        Parameters:
        actionId - Id to associate with the action
        action - Action to register

      • unregisterAction

        public void unregisterAction(java.lang.String actionId)
        Description copied from class: ActionManager
        Unregisters the action with the specified actionId. If you're going to register another action with the same ID, use ActionManager.replaceAction(String, AnAction) instead, otherwise references in action groups may not be replaced.
        Specified by:
        unregisterAction in class ActionManager
        Parameters:
        actionId - Id of the action to be unregistered

      • getRegistrationOrderComparator

        public java.util.Comparator<java.lang.String> getRegistrationOrderComparator()
        Description copied from class: ActionManagerEx
        Comparator compares action ids (String) on order of action registration.
        Specified by:
        getRegistrationOrderComparator in class ActionManagerEx
        Returns:
        a negative integer if action that corresponds to the first id was registered earlier than the action that corresponds to the second id; zero if both ids are equal; a positive number otherwise.

      • replaceAction

        public void replaceAction(java.lang.String actionId,
                          AnAction newAction)
        Description copied from class: ActionManager
        Replaces an existing action with ID actionId by newAction. Using this method for changing behavior of a platform action is not recommended, extract an extension point in the action implementation instead.
        Specified by:
        replaceAction in class ActionManager
